review.author: DevOps
findings: A) Heartbeat dead code cleanup: roleHeartbeats/paneHeartbeats maps, touchHeartbeat, clearHeartbeatForClient, heartbeat handler all removed from websocket-runtime.js. markClientSeen retained for client lastSeen tracking. External callers cleaned: comms-worker-client, comms-worker, websocket-server, hm-send. Grep audit confirms zero remaining references.
B) Teardown bug fix: unregisterTeamMemoryHandlers no longer calls closeTeamMemoryRuntime. Runtime close only runs during app shutdown. Correct separation of concerns.
B) Sweep startup: All 3 sweeps (integrity, belief, pattern) changed from immediate:false to immediate:true. Sweep functions guard on options.immediate !== false, so this fires first run on startup.
Minor: hm-send.test.js has 6 dead heartbeat mock handlers â€” harmless, opportunistic cleanup.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
